review: I purchased this with an expectation that, with Amazon Prime, I will have countless hours of viewing pleasure. I have been disappointed. The apps are great. The unit is quick to start up. There is no lag. Remote is easy to use. Thanks guys!!
author: P. Streiff "pcspauly"

review: Would like a few enhancements like the search within apps to be voice search instead of type search but all in all for the price it sure beats having to pay a cable bill.  No monthly fees so it is a one and done deal.  Should have gotten this a long time ago!
author: Linda Jenkins

review: Great product. Needs support for more media and hard drives would be great. But overall a great product

review: Meh,  not blown away but its ok so far.  No HBO Go without extra hassel of sideloading took a star

review: Love my FireTV. Streams faster than any other device I own. I coulsnt live without it and my Amazon Prime.
author: Amanda Rule

review: No 24p playback is a real shame and might even be a deal-breaker for what is essentially a video playback device.Other than that, excellent and very fluid interface, good clicky remote, mediocre developer support (come on, you just bought Twitch, build a proper app for your own streaming device).This is not a device you're going to replace every year (well it shouldn't be) so I hope Amazon keeps at it and improves its software over time.
author: Benjamin Loos

review: way over priced,not worth it,the roku is far,far superior!
